languages.text: "Мы зовем этот акт умерщвления недостойной плоти Слезами Омниссии. Отказавшись от примитивного способа взирать на мир, положенного мирянам, мы обретаем возможность ощущать Движущую силу вокруг самим своим телом".

"'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."
languages.original_text: "Мы зовем этот акт умерщвления недостойной плоти Слезами Омниссии. Отказавшись от примитивного способа взирать на мир, положенного мирянам, мы обретаем возможность ощущать Движущую силу вокруг самим своим телом".

traits.locale_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

languages.text: "Wir nennen dieses Phänomen 'die Tränen des Omnissiah', dieses Absterben von unwürdigem Fleisch. Indem wir den primitiven Blick der Laien auf die Welt meiden, erhalten wir die Gabe, die Antriebskraft um uns herum mit unserem gesamten Körper zu spüren."
languages.original_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen dieses Phänomen 'die Tränen des Omnissiah', dieses Absterben von unwürdigem Fleisch. Indem wir den primitiven Blick der Laien auf die Welt meiden, erhalten wir die Gabe, die Antriebskraft um uns herum mit unserem gesamten Körper zu spüren."

languages.text: « Nous appelons ce phénomène de dépérissement des chairs indignes "les larmes de l'Omnimessie". En supprimant le moyen primitif des profanes de voir le monde, nous devenons capables de ressentir la Force Motrice qui nous entoure dans tout notre être. »
languages.original_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Nous appelons ce phénomène de dépérissement des chairs indignes "les larmes de l'Omnimessie". En supprimant le moyen primitif des profanes de voir le monde, nous devenons capables de ressentir la Force Motrice qui nous entoure dans tout notre être. »

languages.text: “对于无价值的肉体的消亡过程，我们称之为‘欧姆尼塞亚之泪’。我们摒弃了外行人看待世界的原始方式，可以用整个身体感知我们周围的源力。”
languages.original_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

traits.locale_text: “对于无价值的肉体的消亡过程，我们称之为‘欧姆尼塞亚之泪’。我们摒弃了外行人看待世界的原始方式，可以用整个身体感知我们周围的原初动力。”

languages.text: 「万機神の涙とは、我々がこの現象をそう呼んでいるものだ。それは、価値なき肉体が死に絶えることだ。世界を見るうえでの、一般人の原始的な手段を避けることによって、我らは全身で周囲の原動力を感じ取る能力を得るのだ」
languages.original_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の涙とは、我々がこの現象をそう呼んでいるものだ。それは、価値なき肉体が死に絶えることだ。世界を見るうえでの、一般人の原始的な手段を避けることによって、我らは全身で周囲の原動力を感じ取る能力を得るのだ」

languages.text: «"Lágrimas del Omnissiah" es como llamamos a este fenómeno, a esta muerte de la carne impura. A medida que dejamos atrás los medios primitivos del profano a la hora de ver el mundo, adquirimos la capacidad de sentir la Fuerza Motriz que nos rodea con todo nuestro cuerpo».
languages.original_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

traits.locale_text: «"Lágrimas del Omnissiah" es como llamamos a este fenómeno, a esta muerte de la carne impura. A medida que dejamos atrás los medios primitivos del profano a la hora de ver el mundo, adquirimos la capacidad de sentir la Fuerza Motriz que nos rodea con todo nuestro cuerpo».

languages.text: "Bu fenomene, değersiz etimizin bu ölümüne 'Hermesih'in Gözyaşları' ismini veririz. Avamın dünyaya bakış tarzından kendimizi sıyırarak, etrafımızdaki Devinim Gücü'nü tüm bedenimizle hissedebilme yetisine nail oluruz."
languages.original_text: "'The Omnissiah's Tears' is what we call this phenomenon, this dying away of unworthy flesh. As we shun the layperson's primitive means of looking at the world, we gain the ability to sense the Motive Force around us with our entire bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Bu fenomene, değersiz etimizin bu ölümüne 'Hermesih'in Gözyaşları' ismini veririz. Ayaktakımının dünyayı görmek için kullandığı ilkel yöntemleri bir kenara attığımızda, etrafımızdaki Devinim Gücü'nü tüm bedenimizle hissedebilme kabiliyeti kazanırız."
